name: 陳岡伯
objective: In the second semester, apart from further refining students' writing skills (in the modes of classification and extended definition), the course will also introduce key theoretical approaches in literary and cultural studies to help students establish their arguments and methodologies of their senior projects. Students will read excerpts from original theoretical texts and critical essays that involve theoretical frameworks and write a full research paper at the end of the semester.
